block.p: City Greets Zaire's Rebels Since sweeping into Zaire's second-largest city last week with hardly a fight from Government troops, rebel forces have been welcomed by residents with open arms. Page A3.
Is Buffalo, N.Y., Obsolete? Buffalo's problems have the city considering a radical solution to its woes: Abolishing the city by merging itself with surrounding Erie County. Page B1.
Recalling the Unforgettable In a small Georgia town, a plane crash that killed 72 people in 1977 was remembered by survivors in an unusual reunion. Page A12.
